attributes.review: I got this app and it was a terrible experience. Super glitchy. Not to mention the information was very inaccurate. Could not believe people really thought this app was decent enough to release. Do not recommend to anybody. Trump really did smth with this app 🥰❤️ don’t ever do it again ✨😌🦋
attributes.title: not for anybody really

attributes.review: I love this app! I'm kept up to date on everything trump. WWG1WGA TRUMP 2020 MAGA!! The 1 star reviews are all trump haters and tik tok 12 year olds. The app runs amazingly!! We ❤️ you Trump!!
attributes.title: Amazing app

attributes.review: App requested too much communication in terms of messages and calls. What if they call me to help bust Manafort, Stone or Parnas out of jail while I am driving. That’s too much patriotism for me. I might get distracted and accidentally run over some protesters. Even if Donald pardoned me, it would still be inconvenient.
attributes.title: Asked for too much permission

attributes.review: Yes I am here from that thing you all saw on your for you page but also, I personally dislike Donald trump from all the stuff he’s done. He’s called Mexicans murders even though we have done nothing of the sort. And he wants to ban all Muslims. I don’t know about you but that is not who I want to rule the USA.
attributes.title: NO ❤️✨

attributes.review: This app is so bad if I had the opportunity to give it 0 stars I would. I downloaded this app in hope I could learn more and educate myself but after i downloaded this my phone started to act up and froze do not download this app. They could be hacking your account 😤
attributes.title: Do not download

attributes.review: I was really looking forward to getting to hear more from my favorite president, Donald J. Trump. I know the J stands for Genius. Then I realized I couldn’t speak to him personally. It was the worst day of my life😭. Now I’m not sure if I’ll ever get to see Mango Mussolini in person. Please spread awareness to my pain. The world must know how bad I want to see him.
attributes.title: A true tragedy

attributes.review: This app is so unhelpful and I don't even think it should be an app trump is a horrible person he shouldn't even be president also this app might be hacking all of my apps and accounts so I HATEE this app and I don't recommend downloading it it's a waist of time and I hope Apple takes this app down soon
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: I actually downloaded the app to support our wonderful president but this thing is just terrible. My phone shut down right away and all of a sudden my entire screen turned orange. If I could give it less than 1 star I would 10/10 do not recommend.
attributes.title: Eh

attributes.review: I downloaded this app initially to try to learn Russian government secrets, but the app turned out to be very awful instead. It did some in handy though!! My cat accidentally swallowed some of my cocaine, but using the app for 2 minutes caused her to throw it all up 🥰. I’m so glad this app helped me save my poor sickly cat 😘✨🤗😍❤️💕🧚🏼
attributes.title: Amazing app 👁👄👁

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to order some food. Why is there a Cheeto on the screen? I don’t want Cheetos, I want pizza. Anyways, I tried to order my food but it never came. I would give this zero stars if I could. Horrible app I still don’t have my pizza.
attributes.title: Why is there an orange Cheeto on the screen?
